instruction: Re-order the given sentences to form a paragraph.
input:
Sentence 1: He took a deep breath and jumped out of the plane.
Sentence 2: Mark's first time sky-diving was almost here.
Sentence 3: He had decided to do this months ago.
Sentence 4: From the sky, he could see the trees and buildings below.
output: Mark had decided to go sky-diving months ago. His first time was almost here and he took a deep breath before jumping out of the plane. As he looked down from the sky, he could see the trees and buildings below.
